sys_remote_update_set.description: add or remove member from group based on the user that are selected in group member field in catalog item "onboarding". Also change the manager of group if new manager is requested in item
sys_remote_update_set.name: Add Remove Members

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_9530c8fddb09370019565d50cf9619ca
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.PopulateGroupMembers</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>PopulateGroupMembers</name><script><![CDATA[var PopulateGroupMembers = Class.create();
PopulateGroupMembers.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
getGroupMembers : function() {
	var grmembers=[];
	var group=this.getParameter('sysparm_group');
   var grGroup = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
   grGroup.addQuery('group', group);
   grGroup.query();
while(grGroup.next()){
	grmembers.push(grGroup.user.sys_id);
}
return grmembers.join();
     },
    type: 'PopulateGroupMembers'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>AG</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-04-26 18:28:48</sys_created_on><sys_id>9530c8fddb09370019565d50cf9619ca</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>PopulateGroupMembers</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9530c8fddb09370019565d50cf9619ca</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>AG</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-04-26 18:28:48</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_70cefbeddb09370019565d50cf9619c1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Onboarding">194b7f2ddb09370019565d50cf9619db</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:b62cbb2ddb09370019565d50cf96196e</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>UpdateGroupMembers</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		return;
	}
	var ga = new GlideAjax('PopulateGroupMembers');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name','getGroupMembers');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_group',g_form.getValue('group'));
	ga.getXML(groupMembers);

	function groupMembers(response) {
		var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
	//	alert(answer);
		g_form.setValue('group_members',answer);
	}
	//Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>AG</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-04-26 18:33:47</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>70cefbeddb09370019565d50cf9619c1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>UpdateGroupMembers</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_70cefbeddb09370019565d50cf9619c1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>AG</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-04-26 18:35:00</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

00:00:00bfa49071db89370019565d50cf9619ee100518wf_activityfba45871db89370019565d50cf9619aa1sys_variable_valueRV2019-04-26 19:49:507fa45871db89370019565d50cf9619aa3RV2019-04-26 19:57:09var groupName = current.variables.group; var groupMembers = current.variables.group_members; //Set the new manager if(current.variables.request_new_manager) { var changeGroupManager = new GlideRecord("sys_user_group"); changeGroupManager.addQuery("sys_id", groupName); changeGroupManager.query(); if (changeGroupManager.next()) { changeGroupManager.setValue("manager", current.variables.new_manager); changeGroupManager.update(); } } //Add new users to the group var newMembers = groupMembers.toString().split(',').filter(isPresentInGroup); newMembers.toString().split(",").forEach(function (userId) { if (JSUtil.notNil(userId)) { var addGroupMembers = new GlideRecord("sys_user_grmember"); addGroupMembers.initialize(); addGroupMembers.setValue("group", groupName.toString()); addGroupMembers.setValue("user", userId); addGroupMembers.insert(); } }); //Get the existing users from the group function isPresentInGroup(userId){ var gr=new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember'); gr.addQuery('user', userId); gr.addQuery('group', groupName); gr.query(); if(gr.next()){ return false; }else{ return true; } } var groupMembersArray = []; groupMembersArray = groupMembers.toString().split(","); var grMembers =[]; var grGroupMembers =new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember'); grGroupMembers.addQuery('group', groupName); grGroupMembers.query(); while(grGroupMembers.next()){ grMembers.push(grGroupMembers.getValue('user')); } //Get de-selected users from Glidelist var removeMembers =[]; grMembers.forEach(function(item){ if(groupMembersArray.indexOf(item)==-1){ removeMembers.push(item); } }); //Remove de-selected users from the group removeMembers.forEach(function (userId) { if (JSUtil.notNil(userId)) { var removeGroupMembers = new GlideRecord("sys_user_grmember"); removeGroupMembers.addQuery("group", groupName); removeGroupMembers.addQuery("user", userId); removeGroupMembers.query(); if (removeGroupMembers.next() ) { removeGroupMembers.deleteRecord(); } } }); GlideRecord("sys_user_group"); changeGroupManager.addQuery("sys_id", groupName); changeGroupManager.query(); if (changeGroupManager.next()) { changeGroupManager.setValue("manager", current.variables.new_manager); changeGroupManager.update(); } } //Add new users to the group var newMembers = groupMembers.toString().split(',').filter(isPresentInGroup); newMembers.toString().split(",").forEach(function (userId) { if (JSUtil.notNil(userId)) { var addGroupMembers = new GlideRecord("sys_user_grmember"); addGroupMembers.initialize(); addGroupMembers.setValue("group", groupName.toString()); addGroupMembers.setValue("user", userId); addGroupMembers.insert(); } }); //Get the existing users from the group function isPresentInGroup(userId){ var gr=new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember'); gr.addQuery('user', userId); gr.addQuery('group', groupName); gr.query(); if(gr.next()){ return false; }else{ return true; } } var groupMembersArray = []; groupMembersArray = groupMembers.toString().split(","); var grMembers =[]; var grGroupMembers =new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember'); grGroupMembers.addQuery('group', groupName); grGroupMembers.query(); while(grGroupMembers.next()){ grMembers.push(grGroupMembers.getValue('user')); } //Get de-selected users from Glidelist var removeMembers =[]; grMembers.forEach(function(item){ if(groupMembersArray.indexOf(item)==-1){ removeMembers.push(item); } }); //Remove de-selected users from the group removeMembers.forEach(function (userId) { if (JSUtil.notNil(userId)) { var removeGroupMembers = new GlideRecord("sys_user_grmember"); removeGroupMembers.addQuery("group", groupName); removeGroupMembers.addQuery("user", userId); removeGroupMembers.query(); if (removeGroupMembers.next() ) { removeGroupMembers.deleteRecord(); } } });
